These files are used for build the Windows installer.

binutils/   - the current tools used to generate the MinGW version of libpythonXY.a
gpg/        - the minimal contents of GPG required to sign releases
htmlhelp/   - the final version of HTML Help, used to build the documentation
redist/     - binaries that are redistributed as part of Python's installer
wix/        - the current version of WiX used to build the installer
